website_summaries.verdict: A versatile swimsuit available in a wide range of sizes, colors, and patterns.
pros: Versatile bathing suit straps can be tied as a halter or V-neck
Available in a wide range of solid colors and patterns
Includes tummy control and removable bra padding
Low back makes this one-piece suit more stylish
cons: Low back tends to roll down slightly on some

customer_reviews.title: I NEVER look good in swimsuits
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER look good in swimsuits. But I thought that I’d give this one a chance based on other reviews from women that had already bought it. I was blown away at how beautiful this made me feel. I wear a size 18-22 depending upon the clothing. I bought the 20-22 size and it was just right. I may buy more in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Cup insert position can be fixed
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that has problems with the cup inserts being too high, that can easily be fixed by removing a seam. On the inside, there is a seam that is only there to keep the insert up high, a couple of inches above the main band running across the chest. I used a seam ripper to pull this seam out and the cups are now lower and in the perfect place. Attached are pictures, but not sure how easy it is to see since my lining is black. (A before and after pic)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! My only problem was the breast pads, which are easy to remove & the fact that my breast are huge so I had to tie it around my neck a little tighter than normal for comfort, the swimsuit left a mark on my neck. Other than that, great fit. I'm 235 lbs, I got an extra large! I ended up ordering the olive green, loved it so much, I ordered the wine red also
customer_reviews.author: yolanda newman

customer_reviews.title: Flattering! Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Feel sexy and confident! I got XL I’m 5’4” and weigh 175 M/L in tops D Cup XL pants size.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Especially if you are a bigger chested gal. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love it! I purchased a large. I love the fit, love the coverage, love the quality of material, and the print is super cute! My favorite suit I’ve ever bought to date! I’m even going to buy more in other colors I love it that much! I’m a size 13 In jeans and typically large to xl in shirts. 38 DDD bra size and this covers my chest perfect and is holding everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Flattering suit for all sizes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute and flattering suit. It feels nice and tight on the tummy so you feel pulled in, but the spandex is loose on the top giving a ruched effect so it is very slimming. The color is a very lovely, a deep fuschia. The top can be worn a few different ways, which gives it more versatility then your average suit. I am 40-36-44 US size 14, and the XL fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit 2XL/18, Don't Wast Money.
customer_reviews.text: The bathing suit itself is okay. Unfortunately it just didn't work for me. I wear a size 2XL or 18 and was hoping this suit would be comfortable enough. It wasn't. The back and side support kept rolling under my fat. My breasts were too large for the cups with the padding. There was a little cinching available but it would bunch at the top above my belly or below it, not on it to minimize my tummy. My shape was not flattering at all in this swimsuit but it sure is cute.
customer_reviews.author: PandemoandMaia

customer_reviews.title: She really liked the suit and kept it
customer_reviews.text: bought for my wife - 5'6, 160lbs, 38A cup, holds weight in tummy. She really liked the suit and kept it. Said there wasn't real tummy control material, but the dark color (grape) and ruching hid things well. She had to remove the padding as the cups were closer to her neck than chest. She also has to wear it as a halter top and not the other way (whatever that is) as there was too much excess material in the chest area. Wearing it as a halter pulled the "excess" out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Long torso and it still fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I am tall and the medium fit fine. I usually am a medium in tops and bottoms and ordered a medium in this. This is very slimming and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mamadrama711

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit! Having 5 kids at home I was looking for a bathingsuit that was a one piece but not a “mom suit”. 😂 I wanted something still cute and a little sexy but to be mostly covered. I got it in this one! I have a semi long torso and it fits perfectly. I’m 5”10” and about 140lbs. I ordered the medium. The only spot that doesn’t fit perfectly is the top, it’s a little loose but still super cute and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best fit I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I have not been able to find a one-piece swimsuit that fits me perfectly for years regardless of weight. I am a curvy girl, I’m 5’2” and 210 lbs with DDs and a booty. Generally when I buy swimsuits that fit my chest and butt it’s baggy in the stomach. This swimsuit so flattering, it accentuates my curves were I want it to and hides the ones I don’t want seen, it’s sexy but not too revealing. I can’t wait to hit the beach in this!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with small chests...
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed to be returning this suit. I have larger hips & a big butt. This fit absolutely perfect on my abdomen, hips, & butt. The chest didn't fit me unfortunately. I think it's made for women with large chests. The cups for my breast sat on my collarbone. Even tying the neck piece as tight as a could, it didn't fit right. When I leaned over, it caused a gap between the suit & my skin, giving anyone a little show.. Again, I'm disappointed because it fit so well under my rib cage.. It's not for anyone with a small chest..
customer_reviews.author: Kelfel

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and flattering for curvey girls
customer_reviews.text: I really like this swim suit. Very flattering. Im a size 10, 5 feet tall 38d I have curves this hugs in all the right places. It does not cut at the thighs and butt making your body look like a weird sausage. It has some control in the tummy area as well. Not a lot. But it’s flattering in the waist. The only thing I have to say is the padding is a little weird in the bust. It’s the way it’s sewed in. But they are removable so I just took them out. Other than that. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect will buy another!
customer_reviews.text: I had a baby 3 years ago and never got back to my normal size. I have been searching for a bathing suit that fit and wasn’t black! I am 5’2 a 38GG-H bra and a size 14/16 pant size. This is beautiful and I will buy more! Now you have to be patient adjusting it can be tricky and annoying but worth it. It only rolls down in the back if you have pulled it up too far this is NOT a high cut swimsuit it’s supposed to look vintage pinup so if you make sure your butt is covered it won’t roll down it’s a LOW back suit. I hope this helps you ladies
customer_reviews.author: Zinnia E. Satour-chraa

customer_reviews.title: Two looks in one suit!!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit goes from family friendly to adults in a hot tub really quickly. Pictured is without the inserts though I will need them to perk up my sad mommy boobs. Love the pattern, the material seems thick and durable. The only criticism is the back hits just below my bra line so I do get a little back fat. I’m 5’5” 160lbs and ordered a medium. I would have liked a tighter bodice but my boobs need the larger size. Hubby likes It either way!!
customer_reviews.author: MoMasaurus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Material isn’t good and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Material is terrible. When it stretches out it’s more see through, so the colors fade and doesn’t look good. I always buy clothing items that advertise with free returns because you just never know how it will fit. Well once I got it and tried to return the seller absolutely refused to pay for shipping back, even though I told them it had said prime and free returns when I purchased! I even showed them a screenshot of how it was advertised for my exact design and size and they totally disregarded it. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite swim suit!
customer_reviews.text: I am larger up top 34 D and love how this suit accentuates that but covers too! I feel like I can move around pretty good without anything popping out! Great support around the waist too. Perfect suit!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Herzog

customer_reviews.title: so exposed for so much coverage
customer_reviews.text: *returned* Bought and XL. (5'7, 220ish, 40DD, 12 pant) Fit OK but the back was tooo low, no support for "the girls" (mind you i JUST had a lift in Nov so they don't need much but i still didn't feel comfortable in this suit. Also they have padding, cups that sit WAY high and the back is way low. return was easy, hassle free and fast. loved the print and material but fit was wonky.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So flattering!!
customer_reviews.text: The thought of bathing suit shopping is always so depressing to me but I gave this one a shot and LOVE it!!!! It hides "flaw" areas and is sexy but not overboard. It's slimming and yes the breast pads are way too high but I'll either remove the seam and lower them or just remove them and it'll still be a great suit! I plan to order more in different prints! I'm a size 14-16 in most clothes and ordered an XL and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how well this bathing suits is made. High quality and worth the money. It fit as expected and just love it. I order the small and I’m 5’2, 127pounds. Will buy again from the company!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: I loooveeeee it! My new fav swim suit. I am a 36DDD, 34" waist, 46" hips. 180lbs. I loovvee it i recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Starlit

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this suit for a trip to vegas. I wanted something that covered but would be cute and sexy. This suit did not disappoint! I'm usually a 12 on the bottom, and a 16/18 (38/40DDD) on top, so finding any swimsuit can be a challenge. I did not expect this suit to cover the girls, but it did! It left just enough cleavage to be sexy, and covered all of the bits I wanted covered. It did cover a little more of the backside than I wanted but, overall I was very pleased with the suit. I attached a selfie, sorry its the only photo I have.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! (36K Chest)
customer_reviews.text: Yaaaassss! I tried on a million suits in stores this weekend and couldn't find one that would come close to fitting my chest. This is perfect. I'm a 36K on top, 36 waist, 45 hips. I'm 200lb 5'5" hourglass shape and bought the XL. I don't really see how this could fit anyone with small breasts because it fits mine perfectly. The breast pads are useless and weird- take those out. I'm getting 2 more colors today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and sized
customer_reviews.text: The top is not as pictured (see picture), the construction is below average (I don't think this suit would last long), the molded cups are very small and oddly shaped (not made for breasts), and the suit runs very small. I picked a size larger than I wear in swimsuits, and it's still too small. If you have an hourglass or pear-shaped figure, you'll need to select at least two sizes larger or don't order this. I plan to return this. Even though the price is low, it isn't worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swimsuit. The white wasn't see though at all. Fit like the listing measurements say (definitely read some other reviews too though.) I bought 2 from this company in different colors in similar styles and love them both. Material doesn't feel cheaply made. Cups provided enough coverage and support for my 40D chest after over 3 years total of breastfeeding my children and it has pretty good tummy control too. Buy it. For reference I'm 5'7, 190lbs, 40D cup, usually size 12/14, hourglass shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: The Girls Fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is it! I am very curvy and it does not disappoint. I ordered an XL. It fits true to size. I have 40G breasts.. when I say the girls have room! No cleavage out the sides but the deep v still shows them off. I tried it on without the cups and the fit is perfect. It actually holds them in place without feeling like I'm being strangled. It's high enough in the back to cover the back roll but still low enough to be sexy.... absolutely love it. 5'7" 240lb, 36 inch waist, 40G, hips around 48 inches.
customer_reviews.author: NeshaEffDub

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous plunge neckline, great fit, stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL 16-18 and it fit perfectly. I am a DD, only 5'1 and weigh 179, and this suit is great for my curves. Amazing that it stays in place. It is a little too sexy for a family visit due to the plunge neckline, but my husband loves it . About the strap: someone complained they received the wrong suit because they had weird straps. Tie the strap and then duck your head under the front strap so that both layers are behind your head to get the look shown. Best suit I have and I spent the least on it. Getting another in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and K

customer_reviews.title: The beach isn’t ready...
customer_reviews.text: Swimsuits NEVER fit or flatter me. This one pleasantly surprised me. I’m a 16-18 in pants and decided to buy the XL 16-18. Perfect fit! It holds everything in while still letting your curves do their thing. I’m a 38C and this suit holds me in with just a little cleavage pop. Shipping was super quick. The suit is the perfect combo of sexy and classy. Love it! I will definitely be purchasing more. Utterly amazed by this product!
customer_reviews.author: SFISH

customer_reviews.title: Love how it hides the fupa!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at everyone's beautiful pics of this bathing suit I noticed this color seemed to look great on every body type (I originally had picked a different colored one). I am in the middle of losing weight & recently lost 40 lbs in a short amount of time. Knowing I am not where I want to be but also need something to help hid the extra mom buldges....I am very happy with this purchase. The price makes it even better! 5'5/ 175
customer_reviews.author: Meghan M

customer_reviews.title: One For Busty Betty
customer_reviews.text: The top part was huge and the girls said Hello, Sailor! Pay heed to the photos posted by others. I might as well been topless. Very large peek-a-boo between the boobs. The bottom was ridiculous. Tight and short. I’m 5-5” 150 lbs and 38C. Ordered a large. Just cut crazy. If you’re at least a D cup and have no hips or butt, then this suit is for you. So cute. Disappointed that it didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: pendyrus

customer_reviews.title: Omg boobs!
customer_reviews.text: This suit looks great on your tummy. I feel sexy in it. I'm not a tiny lady. I'm 38c on top and I'm 5ft 6in and 198 lbs. Sadly the boobs do a werid side peek. I'm going have to find a way to keep halter tight and no side boob. Big breasted ladies I bet this suit would be sexy on you. The problem is if you jump in the water you may have a nip slip! The picture I attached you can see what I mean about the boobs. If I turn sideways or bend you can see side boob. My hubby loves it though. For our backyard pool who cares if a nip slips hahah.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit with the top heavy girl in mind
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this swimsuit. It's very hard to find something that fits because I'm top heavy. I hate buying separates because the top fits but the bottom is too big and vice versa. This was a perfect combo that balanced out both. Even when bloated, I still felt comfortable and cute. It was the right amount of sexy without being over the top. I felt great no matter what my body was going through that day. The middle expands to fit your body that day and snatches it in for you without it being tight. Even when wet it keeps it's shape and doesn't give you the saggy butt. I'd definitely buy again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Q

customer_reviews.title: Love..love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit. It makes me feel good and confident. I am 50 years old and I gave birth to 6 children, so I have a belly that doesn't want to leave!! The gathering in the front hides some of the belly, and doesn't draw your attention to it. I'm happy to say this bathing suit makes me feel sexy again!!! And I love... love this color... it's beautiful and vibrant... the black background makes the reds pop!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit.
customer_reviews.text: UGH this bathing suit is horrible. The back fits directly under my back roll lmao and my boobs are way too small for it and I have the front gaping open and the sides keep scrunching up. its ridiculously unflattering and if I wear this on a water slide my boobs are falling out for sure. I hate it and I cried for 10 minutes when I tried it on because i need a bathing suit to wear to my daughters birthday party this weekend. still mad. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Gaping at the chest
customer_reviews.text: I either needed a smaller waist for a smaller size or a bigger chest to fit this one. There was major gaping in the chest despite tying as tight as possible at the neck (which hurt) in both styles of tying the top. I'm 5'2" so short torso, 130lb and 36B. I carry my weight in the middle. If I wanted to bother, I could have probably had to top altered to make it about 2-3 inches shorter in length of the cup material but not worth it sadly. I even tried pulling the bottom down some but no help.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall girls!
customer_reviews.text: For all my tall girls out there- this is a great suit! I was so pleasantly surprised. Finally a one piece that doesn’t cause camel toe! I’m 5’11. 155 lbs. I’m long and lean/ athletic build. My boobs are like pancakes now (thank you children!) so there is extra room on top but you can remediate that by tying tighter at the neck. If you are tall then this is a MUST buy! If you have large boobs - even better!! For the price I will prob buy another in a floral pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Andrezzi

customer_reviews.title: Can't return this item
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this item could not be returned when I purchased and regret buying it. I ignored people complaining about the odd fit of the cups and I agree that the fit is strange and not very flattering. The size I got is also too big so that may be contributing to the fit issues but, of course, this item can't be returned or exchanged so beware unless you're confidant you are getting the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for longer torso!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suit! Usually one pieces don't fit my long torso but with the adjustable neck tie this works great. I ordered a medium and i'm 5' 7" 135lbs, 34D. There is plenty of room in the bust area, which was surprising. I could see this being a great fit for a larger chest. It fits me well as pictured, however I tried it the other way, with the tie going across the front and couldn't get a tight enough fit on my chest, so I'll be wearing it as pictured only! I'm really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MamaZ

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’7, 179, 36DD. I normally wear a large or xlarge. I got an xlarge and probably should have gotten a large. The top is too big and I have to really tightened up the straps to keep my chest from being far too exposed. If it weren’t for that, I would give it five stars. Great quality material. The tummy control is just enough to be flattering but not so tight that’s it’s uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: reeceblp

customer_reviews.title: Nice mom suit that’s a little sexy
customer_reviews.text: Great post baby swim suit. Got it for a trip to Mexico. I wouldn’t wear it at our pool with family lol but it DOES hide the belly with the flower pattern and has a tiny bit of support for the girls. I am 5’4 175ish The suit itself could use more stretch...but can’t beat it for the price. I’m a little chunky and it totally works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit had a few issues. I had purchased one for me and one for my daughter and we both returned them. The side of the suit did not come up high enough on the back and sides to cover my problem areas. I have a large stomach and am very round and this did not flatter my smaller chest with my round belly. The fabric was not stretchy like most bathing suits I have had in the past, which made it very tight across my bottom. I wanted to love this and had seen the pictures of many different body styles but it just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: RGrube

customer_reviews.title: Modest AND sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to all the previous women who posted a photo with your review, it helped me determine this was the swimsuit I needed to order. I am 5’3” and weigh 150 pounds with a small C chest. This suit came clean and the quality of workmanship is average. One side of the top isn’t sewn the exact same as the other so there is a little gapping but the style hides the flaw well enough. I’m looking forward to wearing this on vacation and I’ll update how well it holds together.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cut, really awful fabric quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was SO bummed to return this suit because the cut really is as awesome as all the reviews say, but the fabric is the cheapest of the cheap- the pattern stretches to white across any body area that needs stretching, water beads up weirdly on it, there are loose threads everywhere. I would pay double for this same suit cut in a higher quality fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Tummy control is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on reviews saying the top was large. It was still a bit small for my top. Not to mention I had to order two. The first I received looked as though it had been cut. The lining for the top was missing. I reordered. Hopefully the next one will be in tact. The tummy control is amazing. I went from a medium up to a large. Fingers crossed it won’t be too big on the body and the large will have a bit more room for my ladies. I am a 36K so I have a terrible swimsuit shopping. This is the closest to a good fit as I have found in a one piece!
customer_reviews.author: RUTHLESS

customer_reviews.title: Extremly poorly made and see through
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very poorely. The material is so thin that just holding it in your hands you can completely see through it. Product also runs very small and in no way has tummy control, or breast support as description states. It is also super revealing in the inner thigh region showing basically everything. Oh and you don't get all your money back when returning because they make you pay for return postage after sending you poorly made clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good post baby suit
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8 223 lbs a size 16 true. I ordered an XL and I like the fit perfect. I Just had a baby yet my husband told me not to buy another mom dress style suit. Ha! I love this because it’s well made, thicker material holds my stomach in and the back doesn’t ride up. I like the way the top can be fit two ways. And honestly I feel sexy for the first time in 9 months. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jaime W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and very flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suit!! It fit great and felt super comfortable. I loved it so much that I ordered another one. I am small chested and it looks better with the strap behind the neck. I had read reviews about the pads being higher and they took the seam out but they must have changed this as the cups were exactly where they should be. I am 5’4” 165 pounds and I got the Large. Ordered a second suit and it is amazing as well. The online picture looks teal but it’s defin green. I love green so it’s no big deal to me!!
customer_reviews.author: ZKip

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful suit, I'm a 14/16 in suits 38D-DD in tops and I ordered the XL. This fit well, it's a little larger in the waist on me, but a smaller size might not fit me in the bust. My only concern is that the way this ties leaves my neck sore after wearing it but that is likely due to the large haul of breasts that it has to lift. :-)
customer_reviews.author: RiaGirl910

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: The colors of this suit are great! Very bright and the material is very soft/silky. I bought a medium. I’m 5’4, 130 lbs, B cup. So the lower half of this swimsuit fits snug... and the upper half is really big. I don’t know if I can wear this without exposure. I’ll have to try to get it altered I guess or get a boob job. The top isn’t proportional to the bottom at all.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow! SEXY bathing suit <3
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this bathing suit. I have very large boobs (38G) but a small(ish) waste and no butt, so finding a bathing suit is hell. But, OMG this bathing suit is SO FLATTERING I LOVE IT. (not to mention my husband being crazy in love with this suit due to the cleavage) I ordered an 18 since my chest needs the room and I actually am reordering it in size 16 because it has enough room in the chest, which I am happy about because a 16 will fit my tummy better. BUY THIS SUIT!!! IT IS WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie L. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect post pregnancy swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wear in the water after I had my baby and was feeling self-conscious. I went from being an athletic 5'10 160lbs to 5'10 195 post pregnancy. I've always been self conscious in swimsuits because I'm built long and curvy but not in the way that looks good in swimsuits. This was flattering, long enough for my torso and did great things for my boobs. It's hard to find a one-piece swimsuit when you're tall and I highly recommend this one for other tall women.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it stinks.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the picture of the suit and when it came, it looked just like it! The fabric is very pretty, the sizing is accurate to US sizes and they style is flattering. Unfortunately, it came with a very strong chemical smell that is proving very difficult to wash away. I’ve hand washed it and machine washed it both several times ( cold water/line dry- it held up well) and it still smells funky. I would love to give it a better review but I don’t like smelling bad in my bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This suit is a perfect fit, great quality and SUPER cute! Can’t wait to hit the Lido deck on my cruise this week! Top can be worn two ways (see pics). Comes with removable pads, which I am not wearing in the pics. I ordered a Large and I’m 5’5 and weigh 157 pounds with a 34DD So happy with this purchase! Picture of top styled both ways and a front and back full shot.
customer_reviews.author: TASHA LYNCH

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5, 175lbs, and I got a medium. It fits a little snug but that’s exactly how I like my bathing suits to fit. It doesn’t make me spill out of the back. The color is a little less rich in person and the material is not super thick but it’s also not thin. I am a size 38B/36C and I feel like the chest area is a little large for me but that may also just be the shape of my boobs. Overall, fits SUPER cute, I also ordered the blue polka dot one in a size large which hasn’t arrived yet, but I feel like it may be too big. Will update when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: and i am very disappointed. i will return for a refund NOT a ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered a flower pattern with the strings adjustable. received a solid red, non adjustable straps. cups are so large that makes the suit unwearable. i waited over a month for this item, and i am very disappointed. i will return for a refund NOT a replacement. I will just wear the old suit I have and move on with my life!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe I found a suit without trying it on first.
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised on how much I actually like this suit. I’m not a small girl and hate bathing suits in general but I’m, strangely enough, quite comfortable in this. It’s nice to find a one piece that doesn’t look like something your grandmother would wear. Enough room for larger breasts and it doesn’t cut into my thighs either. My only complaint is, as with any halter type top and larger chest, that the straps do dig in a bit behind the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this swimsuit today and overall I am pleased. It fits as expected. I’m 5’4 165lbs with an hourglass figure and I ordered a large. I’m very happy with the fact that there are cutouts for you to remove the chest pads. I usually have to ruin new clothes and cut them because they are completely sewn in. I also appreciate the wider necktie. Being a larger chested woman I can’t stand how most swimsuits have those shoelace width ties! They do nothing in the way of support and they murder your neck. Very pleased with this swimsuit. So long as it holds up ok in the water I will definitely be ordering more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: It Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't owned a bathing suit for over 20 years and was hesitant to purchase one online. This bathing suit is the business. It fit better than expected and is actually very flattering. I ordered a 2X based on other reviews and it worked out great. I'm 5'6"-270-40D and carry most of my weight in the hip area. The length was good, there was enough room in the leg openings and no annoying riding up. I considered a 3X, but now realize it would have been too loose to be flattering or give any support. Now that I know what to expect, I plan to purchase in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: LVDaws

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This one-piece swimsuit is stunning and sexy! The bathing suit has a cutout in the chest area that sets it apart. The bathing suit is comfortable, and it comes with two pads that are easy to insert into the chest to make it look more flattering. With the tie at the top, the cutout in the front can be adjusted to give you a perfect look! The material is soft and high-quality and is easy to move in, and it is not tight. I love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Meade

customer_reviews.title: GREAT suit for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on vacation in about a week, and I needed some new bathing suits that made me feel my age (20-something!) while also moderately covered up to make me feel comfortable. I bought this suit and I love it! It's so cute, so flattering, and the pattern is great! I will say that the included cups are kinda weird, so I just took them out. The pattern I got is opaque enough that I feel comfortable enough without the cups, but I'm sure I could just as easily put some from another suit into them and it would look fine. Overall, very satisfied, and if I had time I'd get a few more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: HudsonValleyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: The top is just a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: The top was very clearly designed by someone who has never seen the female form before. The cup inserts are literally just domes. Circular, weird domes that would never ever actually fit, cover, let alone mimic a woman's breasts. I removed them, and the material is pretty thin (cough). The way the straps work is just not as pictured, honestly. It almost looks like a halter top with a cleavage cut out that has way too much fabric. Overall, fine-ish for the price. I only kept it because I ordered it hastily while on vacation and I didn't have any other options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying swimsuits period so to buy one online was super scary. This one turned out to be adorable! It fit as expected. I did not have enough boob to fill it up initially but followed the instructions for pulling the second strap around your neck and it worked great! I am 5'3 and 185lbs. I normally wear a 14 and ordered an XL. It fit great once I got the strap figured out. My only complaint would be that having both straps around the back of your neck is a bit uncomfortable after awhile. That being said, I rarely spend more than a couple hours in a swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos Coordinater

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I'm a curvy busty woman (5'6 210lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I'm a curvy busty woman (5'6 210lbs 42DD) and it was a flattering fit. I was worried the deep v would be too "sexy" but work as a halter created a keyhole look and I felt comfortable I wouldn't expose a nipple to anyone. The quality isn't great, I have discovered some pilling after 1 wear but it's fine for a season at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Not very many swimsuits make me feel confident but, this gem right here is amazing. I had already ordered a different print before and came back for this one! It holds you in so well and I love how you can wear it keyhole style or halter. I'm in love! I am about 5'6ish, 210lbs I wear 16 in pants and 14/16 in dresses. Tops I wear XL
customer_reviews.author: Kearuh

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and I’m 5’4 128 pounds 34c. Love the fit. A little loose around the bust when tied around my neck but I didn’t have to worry about it all day. The butt covers my whole butt which was the main look I was going for. Probably won’t order in more colors but definitely glad I snagged this when I did. I did not have the cup problem other reviews wrote about. The odd came outside the bathing suit and you insert them yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear05

customer_reviews.title: Happily Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I am not the type of person and do not have the type of body that I can buy a swimsuit online. I am 5’8 and 170 lbs, not toned by any means and have a chunkier abdomen so I do not feel comfortable in a 2-piece at the moment. I bought the swimsuit after reading the reviews and figured I would end up returning, BUT This swimsuit is very flattering and I was amazed of the quality for a swimsuit I bought that was under $30! I will be buying another one in a different print. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my 5'10" frame as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the suit, except the length. I'm 5'10" and was hopeful after reading reviews from other tall ladies. I'm about 155, and the medium fit perfect around and in the chest. Very flattering. However, it was stretched length wise to the point that the thigh line was super high on me, like the 80's style high cut suits. I know the large would be too loose around, especially for my small chest. It worked fine with a pair of little shorts over it, but I wouldn't wear this alone.
customer_reviews.author: misskillin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really nice swimsuit. I am 203 lbs. and 5’7” and I ordered the XXL which fit perfectly. Really recommended if you want to hide your love handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top runs huge
customer_reviews.text: I love the print of this bathing suite! The colors are very vibrant. The stomach area is flattering (I just had a baby) however, the top chest portion seemed huge! i felt like my boobs were swimming in there! I wear about a 36C-D cup bra so was surprised that they didn't out the top. The butt area I wish was cut a little more cheeky or higher. It is a FULL coverage bottom which some may prefer anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Made for larger bust
customer_reviews.text: Suit was really cute but definitely made for a large bust. I’m 160lb and about a C cup and couldn’t get the suit to work for me. I ordered a medium and a large and the medium was slightly too tight around my stomach but the large had way too much room in the bust that either way I wore it my boobs would easily come out or there was way too much material and it looked odd. Everything lined up fine though unlike some reviewers who said the cups didn’t line up in the right spot. Material seemed fine and I would have kept the suit if the top fit better.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great one-piece!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! I found out I was pregnant in June and wanted something that hid my bloated/pregnant belly early on. I'm 5'5" and roughly 160lbs. I bought both the medium and large in different styles and both fit pretty well. Medium might be a little tight up and down but has plenty of stretch front to back. I wear the large when I'm feeling especially bloated and as the pregnancy has progressed. I've gotten lots of compliments as well! In regards to the cup insert complaints I've seen in other reviews, I have not had any issues. My cup inserts were easily moved to where they were most needed with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Aubri

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful swimsuit. I purchased the one with green palms on a white background in XL. I’m 5’9”, pear shaped, about 170, and wear a size 12. Like other reviews, I agree that the top area can be a tad peekaboo so pay attention that your tatas aren’t greeting everyone when you wear it in public 😀. Other than that, quality seems great. Haven’t wore it swimming yet so I’m anxious to see if the areas that are white will be see through. Let’s hope not lol. Will update later with results.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Faded and to small
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointed. Color was not black looked more gray then black. Flowers were not as bright. Pattern was the same just not as vibrant as shown. As far as the size it was way to small. I were 14-16 and ordered and xl but I couldn't get it to go past my thighs. Even had to take a second look at the size to make sure it was right. Returning as I stated very disappointed as I was super excited I thought about buying it for over 4 weeks and when I did I got it and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I think I’m just built wrong
customer_reviews.text: I think I would love this suit if I was built differently. Holding it up against me, everything should fit. The waist, the chest, the hips, but.... the waist won’t fit over my hips. I’m a classic hour glass and this felt like it would look amazing if someone painted it on me, but I couldn’t get it on. Going up a size would make it too big in the wrong areas. I’m sad. I guess I’ll stick with 2 piece suits
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Patscheck

customer_reviews.title: No tummy control
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. I saw it being advertised as tummy tucker, but I am a mother of three with a little belly and when I put it on o felt absolutely no support. The belly was hanging out. The design is nice but if that is all u are looking for go for it. If you actually need more support this may not be good for you. I usually wear 6-8 in bathing suits. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Cute and flattering!
customer_reviews.text: This suite is so flattering in all the right places. I have tummy insecurities after weight loss and gain and then a csection and I’m not mad how I look in this one piece. Typically o go for a long too that covers my pouch but this one doesn’t make me feel like I need that. It’s a little snug but I can work on myself to make it fit better. Oh and I have a very large chest that’s not young and perky and I love the way it makes the girls look!
customer_reviews.author: Natashia

customer_reviews.title: New mom approved
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated one-piece suits on me, but being 2 months post-partum, I knew it was time to search for one. I am SO glad I happened on this suit. It looks great, and there's enough material up top to hold my boobs, but can also easily be slid to the side to breastfeed without having to untie the whole thing and have both hanging out. I was dreading the upcoming family pool day, but now I can't wait! I am 5'1, 140 lbs, 34DD and 2 months post-partum with a significant belly, and this suit smooths it all together. I bought a Large
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Curves
customer_reviews.text: If you are anything like me, you maybe a curvy woman but also like to have some modesty. Now granted, there is a lot of cleavage in this swimsuit however still tastefully covers everything you want covered! the stomach has the perfect amount of ruching for those lower belly "imperfections" i prefer to cover. This swimsuit also covered my hips and tail end perfectly. It is not a "high" side waste cut. I have a hip tattoo that I prefer to be covered at all times, this swimsuit perfected that! I am 5'3", 165lbs, and a 38DDD Chest.
customer_reviews.author: BrownieB4

customer_reviews.title: Not The Style For Me
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this suit! I loved the colors and I figured the style would hide my problem areas well. When I tried it on, it was a little tight in the bottom half but very doable. The top, however, the top was very loose. I tried adjusting it and put the padding in that it came with, but no matter what I did there was a huge gap between the suit and my chest. I had to send this swimsuit back, unfortunately. The colors in it are just as beautiful in person as they are online - so I wish it had worked!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Tall women beware
customer_reviews.text: I'm a large 5'10, very large chested and at 250 lbs large all over. My body is pretty proportional though, so no excess fat in certain areas (although I wish it would find it's way to my bum lol) the suit fit my chest well enough. Of course it was boobs everywhere but they were held up and felt secure. My issue is the length. Bc of my height the bra part sat about 3 inches too low on my body. It was physically uncomfortable albeit flattering. I suppose if you are tall and thick with a shorter torso this may be a perfect suit for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top way out of proportion
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this suit because the pattern and the style were just right for me. The waist and bottom were just perfect. Unfortunately it is unlikely that the top would have fit anyone because it bloomed out to the sides and was huge and way out of proportion to the rest of the suit. I was so disappointed because it really looks like it was going to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne G. Hein

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the 2 I bought!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swimsuit! It is very flattering to the tummy area. I am 5'10, and I have a long torso which makes it hard to find clothes in general sometimes. There isn't anything I would change about this swimsuit. The torso was wonderfully made, the colors are vivid, and the material seems to be of quality. I received lots of compliments about this swimsuit. I purchased 2 in different colors, and would continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Asya

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, well made. I ordered one size up, and it’s a bit big in the back and chest, but the bottoms fit well. (I’m kinda that shape so...) The chest support/padding came as an insert and you’ll have to find the small hole to put them in if you want that extra shape. Also, follow the instructions and this wraps twice around your neck- the extra toe is long enough to put your head into the loop.
customer_reviews.author: mighty stef loo laa

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! I do feel it runs a little big, I'd personally like more compression in the tummy area than this gives, but overall it's really flattering! I am 5'7" and 160 pounds and got a large but feel I could have done with a medium. I didn't have the issues with the cups that other ladies did so I'm not sure if the manufacturer fixed that or if maybe it depends on the style.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperInColorado

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the fit I am a pear body shape
customer_reviews.text: I simply did not have the boobs for this bathing suit, but I have a butt and there was no space for my rear, but enough room for an entire family in the front. The piece that is supposed to tie around your neck was super uncomfortable. Really a shame it did not work out for me, I absolutely loved the sunflower pattern against the black suit. I ended up giving it to my step mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pattern & Color
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’6” 170lbs and I bought a size L. This suit is very flattering, it has tummy control and is perfect for curvy girls. I am a D cup, I noticed some reviews needed to adjust the bra cups in the suit. I, however, do not have that issue. The material is thick (sturdy), I purchased 1 more waiting delivery. This is the best suit I have purchased for this price! I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Hottie McHotterson reporting for duty
customer_reviews.text: What up large-chested ladies! I have paid 8x as much to find a swimsuit that covers me so that I don’t do the ‘one-eyed squid pop out’ during pool parties. I also have a long torso and am 36F/G, 5’9”, 190 lbs. I got an XL. As you can see, it covers my chesticle area well , is comfy and I look damn hot. Oh! And the top can be configured 2 ways. Amazon- you are welcome for this review, if you want to send me more colors to model I will continue to post reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R.

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit. It covers in all the right places and is very flattering, but yet still has all the perks of a two piece swimsuit. The slight ruffling in the front looks great. I ordered the black top and white/black stripe bottoms. Not see through when wet. The only downside is that the bottoms have a black lining in them that only cover the front and do not extend to cover the back. I wish the fabric continued in the back. I ordered a size Small and am a 5'2 120 lbs and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers Supply

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to order a swimsuit online. This suit is so amazing. I am a bit overweight after being super thin my whole life so finding a suit I feel confident in can be a struggle. This suit does not disappoint. If you are like me and carry you weight where you are heavier in the waist and bottom you worry about the top of the suit being too big. This suit can be worn 2 ways and I found that by putting both straps behind my neck I am not worried about the girls falling out. I would buy this suit again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: A True Miracle Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is amazing!!! Amazing! I usually spend about $175 on a swimsuit, but I decided to order a bunch on Amazon and see if any of them worked. This one is great! I wear a 32 G bra, so I usually go for underwire, and even then it’s hard to find a swimsuit that is both small enough around with big enough cups, especially since I’m a size 6/ 8 in pants. This just works. I think it would probably work for just about anybody. This fits better and looks better on than any of my expensive swimsuits.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Flattering Shape and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The suit gives such a flattering shape - I was surprised how cute it was given the price. Its not cut too high on the thigh but I think the cut on the rear is better than what is shown online. I was worried it was going to be full coverage on the tushy but thankfully its cut in a way that shows off your assets :) I like how it can be worn 2 different ways (triangle-like cups or with a keyhole). The material is much nicer than I thought I'd get at this price point. Overall, very happy and look forward to buying it in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and comfortable suit that hides all the right places just a little Cheeky!
customer_reviews.text: I Really like this Swimsuit. It hides and tucks everything in. I think the only reason I give it a 4 star is that my Butt hangs out a little more than i like. I do really like it and it fits everywhere else really good! I would recommend this to anyone. Just keep in mind that if you are a Big booty girl Like me its pretty showey!! Overall very cute Suit and very comfortable! I love the top portion and that it gives a PeekaBoo look to it!
customer_reviews.author: OregonMillwright

customer_reviews.title: ... I was getting the product I got was nothing like what was pictured or described the top is completely ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I thought I was getting the product I got was nothing like what was pictured or described the top is completely different there is no band at the waist, it plunges all the way to below my bellybutton the is no back at all it hardly covers my butt wrote company for return they are only willing to give me half of what I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this bathing suit!! ❤
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a sliming yet trendy bathing suit... look no further!! I love being out at the pool with the kids, but I hate the way I look in a bathing suit. I unusually wear a shirt over my suit. After trying this on I have the confidence to sit by the pool without a cover up on. I'm not sure how the swimsuit hides all my flab, but it does.. Lol. I'm 4'11 & 155 lbs (Size 11 in jeans) I carry most of my weight in my mid section (hips & stomach). The large fits me perfect. This bathing suit definitely has great tummy control. I'll be ordering more in different colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamiee Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Great slimming suit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 12 and ordered a large. I am a pear shape so this was extremely slimming and proportioned me well. The top is a little big for me so I had to tie it rather tight. The tighter I needed it caused a little too much bunching over my breasts and one strap around neck thinned out. I would love this with only needing one stray around the neck. Interior cups shift and have to be adjusted to you. I may get this altered for me bc I really do love it! Holds us well no stretching out after 2 full days of use. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gaston & Dianna Isidron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not flattering
customer_reviews.text: Colors are Great. The bathing suit is not cheaply made; breast Padding is a good touch. However I have a long torso. It's not abnormal but looks weird in this bathing suit. The top is cute, the way the crotch part is cut wont give you a camel toe. However, if you have the lower belly pouch, it will questionable. I am about 6-7in from my Boob to my hip bone (where the belly slimming should be) I'm 67 in tall and 170lb. The size fits well but looks awkward. When I lose my stomach though, this bathing suit is pretty and I will strut around in it.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great suit...except for the top
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the bottom coverage and fit around the tummy. However I’m having to return because of the upper part. I‘m between a medium and large and got a medium for a secure top, and it just not. Even with the cups in and tie cinched as tight as bearable, it gaps and sags horribly and is a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen. Overall, nice swimsuit, especially for the price and return policy, and worth a try. For reference, I’m 5’5, 150, and 32D.
customer_reviews.author: One happy lady

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5 with mom body. And DDD cup size. The hip cut hits in a great spot. It’s snug in all the right places. I will say the top is just a bit small for me still but it’s manageable. I felt VERY comfy in this suit. For an xl I had room in it. If u are between sizes I’d go up to the next one. I would have fit a large but I like the way the xl isn’t clingy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie potter

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing suit! Feels expensive.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look of this bathing suit. It is very flattering. It is definitely on the tighter side. I am usually between a large and XL in clothes. I ordered an XL and it’s a tight squeeze, but still comfortable. So I’d order a size up. I was worried about the XL with my bust since I am small chested, but you can just pull it tighter and it looks good without gaping. Seems like good quality material. I have swam in it yet. If anything happens after swimming in it I’ll update this review. Otherwise I am in LOVE with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Runkle

customer_reviews.title: Sexy and modest!
customer_reviews.text: 5’6” - 150 lbs - 36C/D - long torso, big bottom I bought the Medium but ended up having to get a Large and, as the picture states, it fits much better! I feel very sexy but modest; perfect for our vacation. The boob cups are weird but adjustable. I took them out and it looks the same, not sure if I’ll use them. I love the cut, and the ruching is very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: B2prity Women One Piece Swimsuit Tummy Control Swimwear V Neck Bathing Suit
feature_bullets: Halter One Piece Swimsuits: There are two ways to tie the strap,adjustable halter neck.And fabric material is stretchy, comfortable, smooth and soft, ensuring you will thoroughly enjoy wearing it.
Tummy Control Swimwear: Ruched pattern in the torso slim your body shape. We've improved the breast design, will help to fit the girls more perfectly and show off your body shape
Deep Plunge Bathing Suit：This classical style with a deep V-neck makes you look more sexy
Backless Women Beachwear: Vintage Backless High Waisted Swimsuit,flattering your curves.
Removable Padded Monokini: According to your need to choose use padded or not.
